question: Name the longest Catalan language Wikipedia page title and state the number of different words in this page.
query: SELECT title, words FROM pages WHERE title = ( SELECT MAX(LENGTH(title)) FROM pages )

question: List all the Catalan language wikipedia page title with less than 10 number of different words in these pages.
query: SELECT title FROM pages WHERE words < 10

question: List the page number for Catalan language wikipedia pages containing the word 'Art' in the page title.
query: SELECT page FROM pages WHERE title LIKE 'Art%' OR title LIKE '%Art%' OR title LIKE '%Art'

question: What is the title of Catalan language wikipedia page with revision page id '16203226'?
query: SELECT title FROM pages WHERE revision = 16203226

question: List the titles for all Catalan language wikipedia page from revision page id 106600 to 106700.
query: SELECT title FROM pages WHERE revision BETWEEN 106600 AND 106700

question: How many Catalan language wikipedia pages have between 1000 to 2000 number of different words?
query: SELECT COUNT(pid) FROM pages WHERE words BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000

question: List the page id of wikipedia about Catalan language which have the appearance of the word 'decimal'?
query: SELECT T2.pid FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T1.word = 'decimal'

question: Which word has the most occurrences within the same page of wikipedia about Catalan language?
query: SELECT T1.word FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T2.occurrences = ( SELECT MAX(occurrences) FROM pages_words )

question: List all the first words of the biwords pair where the second word is 'antic'.
query: SELECT T1.word FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w1st WHERE T2.w2nd = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'antic' )

question: Show all the title of pages and number of occurences for each page where the word 'quipu' appears.
query: SELECT T1.title, T2.occurrences FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid INNER JOIN words AS T3 ON T2.wid = T3.wid WHERE T3.word = 'quipu'

question: Calculate the average number of the word occurrences in which ‘system’ appeared as the first word in the pair.
query: SELECT AVG(T2.occurrences) FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w1st WHERE T2.w1st = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'sistema' )

question: What is the total pages of Wikipedia in Catalan language?
query: SELECT pages FROM langs WHERE lang = 'ca'

question: In the Catalan language, which biwords pair appeared the most in this language/page?
query: SELECT w1st, w2nd FROM biwords WHERE occurrences = ( SELECT MAX(occurrences) FROM biwords )

question: What is the word id of the catalan language that was repeated no more than 10 times in the said language?
query: SELECT wid FROM langs_words WHERE occurrences <= 10

question: What is the title of the Catalan language Wikipedia page that has the highest number of different words?
query: SELECT title FROM pages WHERE words = ( SELECT MAX(words) FROM pages )

question: What is the wikipedia page id of Arqueozoologia?
query: SELECT page FROM pages WHERE title = 'Arqueozoologia'

question: In Abadia, what is the word id of the of the Catalan language that appeared the highest amount of times? Indicate the how many times did they said word id appeared.
query: SELECT T2.wid, T2.occurrences FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid WHERE T1.title = 'Abadia' ORDER BY T2.occurrences DESC LIMIT 1

question: What are the titles of the top 5 Catalan language Wikipedia page with the least number of different words? Indicate each title's word id that has appeared the most in the said pages.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid ORDER BY T1.words LIMIT 5

question: How many times did the word pair "i" and "a" appeared in the Cataln language/page?
query: SELECT SUM(occurrences) FROM biwords WHERE w1st = 86 AND w2nd = 109

question: What are the word pairs that occured only twice?
query: SELECT T1.word, T3.word FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w1st INNER JOIN words AS T3 ON T3.wid = T2.w2nd WHERE T2.occurrences = 2

question: What is the word pair that occured the highest amount of times in Addicio? Indicate how many times such word pair occured.
query: SELECT T3.w1st, T3.w2nd, T3.occurrences FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid INNER JOIN biwords AS T3 ON T2.wid = T3.w1st OR T2.wid = T3.w2nd WHERE T1.title = 'Addicio' ORDER BY T3.occurrences DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the total word of title "Adam" and "Acampada"?
query: SELECT SUM(words) FROM pages WHERE title IN ('Adam', 'Acampada')

question: What is the revision page ID of title "Aigua dolÃ§a"?
query: SELECT revision FROM pages WHERE title = 'Aigua dolÃ§a'

question: What is the title of corpus with most words?
query: SELECT title FROM pages WHERE words = ( SELECT MAX(words) FROM pages )

question: What is the average words of the 10 fewest words title?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN words >= 10 THEN words ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / SUM(CASE WHEN words >= 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM pages

question: Among the title with single digit word count, list down 5 revision page ID of these titles.
query: SELECT revision FROM pages WHERE words < 10 LIMIT 5

question: List down the page id of titles start with alphabet "b".
query: SELECT pid FROM pages WHERE title LIKE 'b%'

question: What is the title of corpus where word "desena" appear?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid INNER JOIN words AS T3 ON T2.wid = T3.wid WHERE T3.word = 'desena'

question: What is the word id for title "Sometent"?
query: SELECT T2.wid FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid WHERE T1.title = 'Sometent'

question: Is word id "88" the word id for title "Animals"?
query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(T1.pid) > 0 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS YORN FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid WHERE T2.wid = 88 AND T1.title = 'Animals'

question: What are the occurance of word "del" in title "Any anomalÃ­stic"?
query: SELECT T2.occurrences FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid INNER JOIN pages AS T3 ON T2.pid = T3.pid WHERE T1.word = 'del' AND T3.title = 'Any anomalÃ­stic'

question: State one biword pair with occurence of 4.
query: SELECT T1.word, T3.word FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w1st INNER JOIN words AS T3 ON T3.wid = T2.w2nd WHERE T2.occurrences = 4 LIMIT 1

question: What are the total occurence of words that paired with "nombre"?
query: SELECT SUM(T2.occurrences) FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w1st OR T1.wid = T2.w2nd WHERE T2.w1st IN (( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'nombre' ) OR T2.w2nd IN ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'nombre' ))

question: What are the words that were paired with "John", list down 10 of them.
query: SELECT w2nd FROM biwords WHERE w1st = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'john' ) LIMIT 10

question: List down the revision page id of titles where "fresc" appears.
query: SELECT T3.revision FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid INNER JOIN pages AS T3 ON T2.pid = T3.pid WHERE T1.word = 'fresc'

question: List down the words with word id from 1 to 10 and write down a paired word for each of them.
query: SELECT T1.word AS W1, T3.word AS W2 FROM words AS T1 LEFT JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w1st LEFT JOIN words AS T3 ON T3.wid = T2.w2nd WHERE T1.wid <= 10 GROUP BY T1.wid

question: For corpus title "Atomium", pick 3 words appear in the title and calculate the total occurence of these words.
query: SELECT T1.word, T1.occurrences FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T2.pid = ( SELECT pid FROM pages WHERE title = 'Atomium' ) LIMIT 3

question: Indicate which is the word that is repeated the most times.
query: SELECT word FROM words WHERE occurrences = ( SELECT MAX(occurrences) FROM words )

question: Indicate the page id of Wikipedia about Catalan language of all the pages that have a numeric value in their title.
query: SELECT pid, title FROM pages WHERE title LIKE '%0%' OR '%1%' OR '%2%' OR '%3%' OR '%4%' OR '%5%' OR '%6%' OR '%7%' OR '%8%' OR '%9%'

question: What is the title of the page that has the fewest words?
query: SELECT title FROM pages WHERE title = ( SELECT MIN(words) FROM pages )

question: What is the pair of words that is repeated the most times? Identify them by their ID.
query: SELECT w1st, w2nd FROM biwords WHERE occurrences = ( SELECT MAX(occurrences) FROM biwords )

question: How many total occurrences are there in the three-letter words?
query: SELECT SUM(occurrences) FROM words WHERE LENGTH(word) = 3

question: Calculate the average number of different words that appear on all pages whose title begins with A.
query: SELECT AVG(words) FROM pages WHERE title LIKE 'A%'

question: Calculate the average number of repetitions in the pairs of words in which the first word id is number 34.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN w1st = 34 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(w1st) FROM biwords

question: Calculate the percentage of pages that have 1500 different words.
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN words = 1500 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(page) FROM pages WHERE words > 300 LIMIT 3

question: Calculate the percentage of times that the same word appears in a pair.
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN w1st = w2nd THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(w1st) FROM biwords

question: Indicate the title of all the pages in which the word comunitat appears.
query: SELECT T3.title FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid INNER JOIN pages AS T3 ON T2.pid = T3.pid WHERE T1.word = 'comunitat'

question: Indicate on how many different pages the word ripoll appears.
query: SELECT T3.page FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid INNER JOIN pages AS T3 ON T2.pid = T3.pid WHERE T1.word = 'ripoll'

question: How many words are repeated on the Llista de conflictes armats page?
query: SELECT occurrences FROM pages_words WHERE pid = ( SELECT pid FROM pages WHERE title = 'Llista de conflictes armats' )

question: Indicate if there is any pair formed by the words fukunaga and d'egees.
query: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(T1.wid) > 0 THEN 'yes' ELSE 'no' END FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w1st OR T1.wid = T2.w2nd WHERE T2.w1st = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE T1.word = 'fukunaga' ) AND T2.w2nd = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word LIKE 'd%egees' )

question: Calculate the average of repetitions in the pages that have a total of 100 different words.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(T2.occurrences) AS REAL) / COUNT(T1.page) FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid WHERE T1.words = 100

question: Which Wikipedia page number does the Catalan language's name, Acampada, appear on?
query: SELECT page FROM pages WHERE title = 'Acampada'

question: Please list any three Wikipedia pages with more than 300 words.
query: SELECT page FROM pages WHERE words > 300 LIMIT 3

question: How many times did the word number 8 appear?
query: SELECT occurrences FROM words WHERE wid = 8

question: Please list the top three most frequently occurring words and their ids.
query: SELECT word, wid FROM words ORDER BY occurrences DESC LIMIT 3

question: How frequently did the words 1 and 25 appear together?
query: SELECT occurrences FROM biwords WHERE w1st = 1 AND w2nd = 25

question: What number of words are there on revision page 27457362?
query: SELECT words FROM pages WHERE revision = 27457362

question: What is the percentage of words in the Catalan language that have a repetition of more than 16,000 times?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN occurrences > 16000 THEN lid ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(lid) FROM langs_words

question: Which Wikipedia page number has the highest number of words in the Catalan language?
query: SELECT page FROM pages WHERE words = ( SELECT MAX(words) FROM pages )

question: What proportion of a pair of words in the Catalan language have been repeated less than 80 times?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN occurrences < 80 THEN lid ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(lid) FROM biwords

question: How many Catalan-language Wikipedia pages are there overall?
query: SELECT pages FROM langs WHERE lang = 'ca'

question: Please list any three Wikipedia pages that are written in Catalan, together with their titles and revision page numbers.
query: SELECT title, revision FROM pages WHERE lid = 1 LIMIT 3

question: What is the language of the pair of words numbered 1 and 616?
query: SELECT T2.lang FROM biwords AS T1 INNER JOIN langs AS T2 ON T1.lid = T2.lid WHERE T1.w1st = 1 AND T1.w2nd = 616

question: How many times does the Catalan word "nombre" repeat itself?
query: SELECT T1.occurrences FROM langs_words AS T1 INNER JOIN words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T2.word = 'nombre'

question: What is the second word in the pair of words number 1 and 8968?
query: SELECT word FROM words WHERE wid = 8968

question: Which word has the most repetitions in the Catalan language?
query: SELECT T2.word FROM langs_words AS T1 INNER JOIN words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T1.occurrences = ( SELECT MAX(occurrences) FROM langs_words )

question: How many times on page number 44 does the word "votives" appear?
query: SELECT T2.occurrences FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T1.word = 'votives' AND T2.pid = 44

question: How many times on page number 16 does the second word in the pair of words 1 and 109 appear?
query: SELECT SUM(T1.occurrences) FROM pages_words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T2.w2nd = T1.wid WHERE T2.w2nd = 109 AND T2.w1st = 1 AND T1.pid = 16

question: What is the percentage of the words that have been repeated under 180 times in the Catalan language?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T2.occurrences < 180 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.lid) FROM langs AS T1 INNER JOIN langs_words AS T2 ON T1.lid = T2.lid WHERE T1.lang = 'ca'

question: What percentage of Catalan-language Wikipedia pages have more than 10,000 words?
query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN T2.words > 10000 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T2.page) FROM langs AS T1 INNER JOIN pages AS T2 ON T1.lid = T2.lid WHERE T1.lang = 'ca'

question: How many times the word "desena" occurs?
query: SELECT occurrences FROM words WHERE word = 'desena'

question: How many words has the appearance times greater than 10?
query: SELECT COUNT(w1st) AS countwords FROM biwords WHERE occurrences > 10

question: List out the total pages of Wikipedia in Catalan language.
query: SELECT pages FROM langs

question: How many words have repetitions greater than 2000 and lower than 5000?
query: SELECT COUNT(wid) FROM langs_words WHERE occurrences BETWEEN '2000' AND '5000'

question: List out the title of Catalan language Wikipedia page that has wikipedia revision page id as 106601.
query: SELECT title FROM pages WHERE revision = 106601

question: State the Wikipedia page title that has revision page id of 28040864.
query: SELECT title FROM pages WHERE revision = 28040864

question: How many times that the word pair of "barcelona" and "precolombina" occur?
query: SELECT SUM(occurrences) FROM biwords WHERE w1st = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'barcelona' ) AND w2nd = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'precolombina' )

question: What is the locale of the language of the page titled "Anys 90"?
query: SELECT T1.locale FROM langs AS T1 INNER JOIN pages AS T2 ON T1.lid = T2.lid WHERE T2.title = 'Anys 90'

question: Which word that has 71303 appearance in the Catalan language?
query: SELECT T1.word FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN langs_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T2.occurrences = 71303

question: What is the locale of the language of the page titled "Abril"?
query: SELECT T1.locale FROM langs AS T1 INNER JOIN pages AS T2 ON T1.lid = T2.lid WHERE T2.title = 'Abril'

question: What is the total number of words in page containing pair of word id "100" and "317"?
query: SELECT words FROM langs WHERE lid = ( SELECT lid FROM biwords WHERE w1st = 100 AND w2nd = 317 )

question: State the total pages of the words that has repeated times of 2593.
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.pages) FROM langs AS T1 INNER JOIN langs_words AS T2 ON T1.lid = T2.lid WHERE T2.occurrences = 2593

question: List out the title of the word have id less than 20.
query: SELECT DISTINCT T1.title FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid WHERE T2.wid < 20

question: How many word that has number of different words equal to 3?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.wid) FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid WHERE T1.words = 3

question: How many word appeared 8 times? State the language id of the page.
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.wid), T1.lid FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid WHERE T2.occurrences = 8

question: Calculate the average percentage of word appearance in the page that have revision page id smaller than 106680.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(T1.words) AS REAL) * 100 / SUM(T2.occurrences) FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid WHERE T1.revision < 106680

question: List out the total pages of the words that has repeated times more than 3000.
query: SELECT T1.pages FROM langs AS T1 INNER JOIN langs_words AS T2 ON T1.lid = T2.lid WHERE T2.occurrences > 3000 GROUP BY T1.pages

question: State the name of the pair of word that have id of 20 and 50?
query: SELECT T1.word, T3.word FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w1st INNER JOIN words AS T3 ON T3.wid = T2.w2nd WHERE T2.w1st = 20 AND T2.w2nd = 50

question: How many pages of Wikipedia are there in total on the Catalan language?
query: SELECT pages FROM langs WHERE lang = 'ca'

question: Please list the titles of the Wikipedia pages on the Catalan language with more than 4000 words.
query: SELECT title FROM pages WHERE lid = 1 AND words > 4000

question: How many words are there on the page titled "Asclepi"?
query: SELECT words FROM pages WHERE title = 'Asclepi'

question: Which of these pages have more words, the page titled "Afluent" or "Asclepi"?
query: SELECT CASE WHEN ( SELECT words FROM pages WHERE title = 'Asclepi' ) > ( SELECT words FROM pages WHERE title = 'Afluent' ) THEN 'Asclepi' ELSE 'Afluent' END

question: What is the occurrence of the word "nombre"?
query: SELECT occurrences FROM words WHERE word = 'nombre'

question: Please list the Catalan words with an occurrence of over 200000.
query: SELECT word FROM words WHERE occurrences > 200000

question: What is the locale of the language of the page titled "Asclepi"?
query: SELECT T2.locale FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN langs AS T2 ON T1.lid = T2.lid WHERE T1.title = 'Asclepi'

question: How many times did the word "grec" occur on the page titled "Àbac"?
query: SELECT T2.occurrences FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid INNER JOIN pages AS T3 ON T2.pid = T3.pid WHERE T3.title = 'Àbac' AND T1.word = 'grec'

question: Please list the title of the pages on which the word "grec" occurred for over 20 times.
query: SELECT T3.title FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid INNER JOIN pages AS T3 ON T2.pid = T3.pid WHERE T1.word = 'grec' AND T2.occurrences > 20

question: How many words are there on the page that the word "grec" has occurred for 52 times?
query: SELECT SUM(T3.words) FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid INNER JOIN pages AS T3 ON T2.pid = T3.pid WHERE T1.word = 'grec' AND T2.occurrences = 52

question: What's the occurrence of the biwords pair whose first word is "àbac" and second word is "xinès"?
query: SELECT occurrences FROM biwords WHERE w1st = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'àbac' ) AND w2nd = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'xinès' )

question: Which biwords pair has a higher occurrence, "àbac-xinès" or "àbac-grec"?
query: SELECT CASE WHEN ( SELECT occurrences FROM biwords WHERE w1st = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'àbac' ) AND w2nd = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'xinès' ) ) > ( SELECT occurrences FROM biwords WHERE w1st = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'àbac' ) AND w2nd = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'grec' ) ) THEN 'àbac-xinès' ELSE 'àbac-grec' END AS CALUS FROM words LIMIT 1

question: How many more times does the first word in the biwords pair "àbac-xinès" occur than the biwords pair itself?
query: SELECT occurrences - ( SELECT occurrences FROM biwords WHERE w1st = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'àbac' ) AND w2nd = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'xinès' ) ) AS CALUS FROM words WHERE word = 'àbac'

question: Please list all the biwords pairs with "àbac" as its first word.
query: SELECT T1.word AS W1, T3.word AS W2 FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w1st INNER JOIN words AS T3 ON T3.wid = T2.w2nd WHERE T1.word = 'àbac'

question: What is the total occurrence of the biwords pairs with "àbac" as its first word?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.w1st) FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w1st INNER JOIN words AS T3 ON T3.wid = T2.w2nd WHERE T1.word = 'àbac'

question: How many Wikipedia pages are there on the language of the biwords pair "àbac-xinès"?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.pages) FROM langs AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.lid = T2.lid WHERE T2.w1st = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'àbac' ) AND T2.w2nd = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'xinès' )

question: How much higher in percentage does the word "grec" occur on the page titled "Àbac" than on the page titled "Astronomia"?
query: SELECT CAST((SUM(CASE WHEN T3.title = 'Àbac' THEN T2.occurrences END) - SUM(CASE WHEN T3.title = 'Astronomia' THEN T2.occurrences END)) AS REAL) * 100 / SUM(CASE WHEN T3.title = 'Astronomia' THEN T2.occurrences END) FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid INNER JOIN pages AS T3 ON T2.pid = T3.pid WHERE T1.word = 'grec'

question: How many pages does the Catalan language have in Wikipedia?
query: SELECT pages FROM langs WHERE lang = 'ca'

question: Which word has the most repetitions in the Catalan language? Give the ID of the word.
query: SELECT wid FROM langs_words WHERE occurrences = ( SELECT MAX(occurrences) FROM langs_words )

question: What is the word ID for the second word for the biwords pair with most repetitions?
query: SELECT w2nd FROM biwords WHERE occurrences = ( SELECT MAX(occurrences) FROM biwords )

question: How many occurrences does the word "panajot" have?
query: SELECT occurrences FROM words WHERE word = 'panajot'

question: Which word has the time of occurrences as 340691?
query: SELECT word FROM words WHERE occurrences = 340691

question: State the word ID for "periodograma".
query: SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'periodograma'

question: For the biwords pair that appears "116430" times, what is the second word of the pair?
query: SELECT T1.word FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w2nd WHERE T2.occurrences = 116430

question: How many times does the word "riu" appears in the biwords pair?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.wid) FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w1st INNER JOIN words AS T3 ON T3.wid = T2.w2nd WHERE T1.word = 'riu'

question: Which word has the most appearances in the Wikipedia page with the title of "Agricultura"? Give the word ID.
query: SELECT T2.wid FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid WHERE T1.title = 'Agricultura' ORDER BY T2.occurrences DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many appearances does the word ID No. 2823 have in the Wikipedia page "Astre"?
query: SELECT SUM(T2.occurrences) FROM pages AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.pid = T2.pid WHERE T1.title = 'Astre' AND T2.wid = 2823

question: In which Wikipedia page does the word ID No. 174 have the most appearances? Give the title.
query: SELECT title FROM pages WHERE pid = ( SELECT pid FROM pages_words WHERE wid = 174 ORDER BY occurrences DESC LIMIT 1 )

question: How many times does the word "heròdot" appear in the Wikipedia page?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.occurrences) FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T1.word = 'heròdot'

question: Which word has the most appearances in the Wikipedia page revision ID No. 28278070? Give the word ID.
query: SELECT pid FROM pages_words WHERE pid = ( SELECT pid FROM pages WHERE revision = 28278070 ) ORDER BY occurrences DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many times does the biwords "que gregorio" appear in the language?
query: SELECT occurrences FROM biwords WHERE w1st = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'que' ) AND w2nd = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'gregorio' )

question: How many biword pairs contain the word "base" as the second word?
query: SELECT COUNT(w1st) FROM biwords WHERE w2nd = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'base' )

question: How many times of repetition does the word "exemple" show in the Catalan language?
query: SELECT T2.occurrences FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN langs_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T1.word = 'exemple' AND T2.lid = 1

question: Which word that has 274499 repetitions in the Catalan language?
query: SELECT T1.word FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN langs_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T2.occurrences = 274499 AND T2.lid = 1

question: How many times greater is the appearances of the biword pair "a base" than "a decimal"?
query: SELECT CAST(occurrences AS REAL) / ( SELECT occurrences FROM biwords WHERE w1st = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'a' ) AND w2nd = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'decimal' ) ) FROM biwords WHERE w1st = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'a' ) AND w2nd = ( SELECT wid FROM words WHERE word = 'base' )

question: For the word "grec", what is the percentage of the appearances in the "Art" Wikipedia page have among all the appearances?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T3.title = 'Art' THEN T2.occurrences ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / SUM(T2.occurrences) FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid INNER JOIN pages AS T3 ON T2.pid = T3.pid WHERE T1.word = 'grec'

question: How many Wikipedia pages with over 4000 different words are there on the Catalan language?
query: SELECT COUNT(lid) FROM pages WHERE lid = 1 AND words > 4000

question: Please list the titles of all the Wikipedia pages on the Catalan language with 10 different words.
query: SELECT title FROM pages WHERE lid = 1 AND words = 10 LIMIT 10

question: What is the word that occurs the most in the Catalan language?
query: SELECT word FROM words WHERE occurrences = ( SELECT MAX(occurrences) FROM words )

question: Please list the titles of the top 3 Wikipedia pages with the most different words on the Catalan language.
query: SELECT title FROM pages WHERE lid = 1 ORDER BY words DESC LIMIT 3

question: What is the revision ID for the page on Catalan titled "Arqueologia"?
query: SELECT revision FROM pages WHERE lid = 1 AND title = 'Arqueologia'

question: Among the wikipedia pages on Catalan with more than 300 different words, how many of them have a revision ID of over 28330000?
query: SELECT COUNT(lid) FROM pages WHERE lid = 1 AND words > 300 AND revision > 28330000

question: Please list the page IDs of all the Wikipedia pages that have the word "nombre" appeared on it.
query: SELECT T2.pid FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T1.word = 'nombre'

question: How many Wikipedia pages on Catalan are there with the word "nombre" appearing for more than 5 times?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.pid) FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T1.word = 'nombre' AND T2.occurrences > 5

question: How many biwords pairs are there whose second word is "grec"?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.w1st) FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w2nd WHERE T1.word = 'grec'

question: What is the title of the page on which the word "grec" has an occurrence of 52 times.
query: SELECT T3.title FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid INNER JOIN pages AS T3 ON T2.pid = T3.pid WHERE T1.word = 'grec' AND T2.occurrences = 52

question: Among the biwords pairs with "àbac" as its first word, how many of them have an occurrence of over 10?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.w2nd) FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN biwords AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.w1st WHERE T1.word = 'àbac' AND T2.occurrences > 10

question: What is the average occurrence of the word "grec" on each Wikipedia page that has this word?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(T2.occurrences) AS REAL) / COUNT(T1.wid) FROM words AS T1 INNER JOIN pages_words AS T2 ON T1.wid = T2.wid WHERE T1.word = 'grec'
